entrance_description: As you enter the Mirror World Town Square, you're greeted by a surreal yet familiar scene. The town square, echoing the one from your past life, shimmers with a mystical quality. The central fountain's water flows in graceful arcs, casting prismatic colors onto the cobblestone.

monsters.name: Reflection Wraith
monsters.encounter_message: A shadowy figure emerges from the mirrored surface, its form a distorted echo of your own. The Reflection Wraith moves towards you, its movements an eerie mimicry of life.

monsters.name: Spectral Hound
monsters.encounter_message: From the alleyways, a ghostly hound appears, its eyes glowing with a faint light. It circles you, emitting a low, mournful howl that resonates with the sorrow of the Mirror World.

monsters.name: Mirror Shade
monsters.encounter_message: A flicker in the reflection catches your eye, and you see a Mirror Shade materialize. It's a barely-there presence, a whisper of movement and light, yet its chill is palpable.

monsters.name: Eidolon Apparition
monsters.encounter_message: An ethereal figure floats towards you, its features blurred and shifting. The Eidolon Apparition reaches out, its touch cold and tinged with the sadness of unfulfilled dreams.

monsters.name: Lost Echo
monsters.encounter_message: A sound from behind makes you turn, revealing a Lost Echo. It's a fragment of a soul, repeating a moment from its past over and over, trapped in a cycle of its own making.

area_descriptions: The cobblestone paths of the town square gleam like polished silver, reflecting the world around them.
The laughter and chatter of the townspeople are like echoes from another time, both familiar and haunting.
The scent of phantom flowers and ethereal spices fills the air, a reminder of life's pleasures and pains.
Shadows play across the buildings, creating patterns that seem to tell their own stories.
The fountain at the center is a mesmerizing sight, its water a dance of light and color.
Buildings around the square have a translucent quality, their walls shimmering with memories and dreams.
A gentle breeze carries whispers of lost loves and forgotten promises.
